ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: PemJa is an open source cross language call framework based on FFI. It aims to provide a high-performance framework of calling between different languages.
PemJa is an open source cross language call framework based on FFI. It aims to provide a high-performance framework of calling between different languages.
PemJa is an open source cross language call framework based on FFI. It aims to provide a high-performance framework of calling between different languages.
PemJa is an open source cross language call framework based on FFI. It aims to provide a high-performance framework of calling between different languages.

name: pemja

about.summary: PemJa is an open source cross language call framework based on FFI. It aims to provide a high-performance framework of calling between different languages.
PemJa is an open source cross language call framework based on FFI. It aims to provide a high-performance framework of calling between different languages.

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  version: 0.6.1

package:
  name: pemja
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/p/pemja/pemja-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 88ffcd5427725e12b10c8740e0b061087f5d1a66abef9cf932e3d4821b4033f9

build:
  number: 1
  skip: win
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - openjdk
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - python
  host:
    - python
    - packaging >=20.5
    - setuptools
    - wheel
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - find-libpython

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - pemja
  - requirements:
      run:
        - pip
    script:
      - pip check

about:
  summary: PemJa is an open source cross language call framework based on FFI. It aims to provide a high-performance framework of calling between different languages.
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  homepage: https://github.com/alibaba/pemja
  documentation: https://github.com/alibaba/pemja

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - danielnachun
    - gforsyth
    - deepyaman
